NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Facebook and Content or the cell corresponding to YouTube and Creator Economy?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Facebook} and {Content} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Online News and Creator Economy or the cell corresponding to Facebook and Data Privacy?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Blogs and Growth or the cell corresponding to YouTube and Platform Trends?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {YouTube} and {Platform Trends} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.32 to 0.56?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Gaming Platforms, Content), (Blogs, Data Privacy), (Instagram, Growth), (Netflix, Growth), (Facebook, Platform Trends), (YouTube, Platform Trends), (Gaming Platforms, Users), (YouTube, Users)}.
